rule_text: A structure is a type of unit. PDS units and space docks are structures.   74.1 Structures are always placed on planets.    The Clan of Saar 'Floating Factory' faction-specific space dock is placed in a system's space area.    74.2 Structures are primarily placed on planets using the 'Construction' strategy card.   74.3 Structures cannot move or be transported.   74.4 A player can have a maximum of one space dock on each planet.   74.5 A player can have a maximum of two PDS units on each planet.         Construction       PDS       Units       Space Dock
